All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bluetooth
Represents a Bluetooth device.
BME280
Represents a BME280 temperature sensor device.
Device
Represents a generic hardware device.
DHT11
Represents a DHT11 temperature sensor device.
Display
Represents an abstract display device.
GY951
Represents a GY951 IMU sensor (Inertial Measurement Unit).
HWSystem
Represents the hardware system that manages devices and their connections.
I2C
Represents the I2C communication protocol.
IMUSensor
Represents an Inertial Measurement Unit (IMU) sensor.
LCD
Represents an LCD display.
Main
The Main class to initialize the system, read configuration files, and handle user commands.
MotorDriver
Represents a motor driver device.
MPU6050
Represents an MPU6050 IMU sensor (Inertial Measurement Unit).
OLED
Represents an OLED display.
OneWire
Represents the OneWire communication protocol.
PCA9685
Represents a PCA9685 motor driver.
Port
Represents a connection point for a device using a specific protocol.
Protocol
Defines the contract for communication protocols.
Sensor
Represents a sensor device, extending Device.
SparkFunMD
Represents a SparkFunMD motor driver.
SPI
Represents the SPI communication protocol.
State
Represents the state of a device.
TempSensor
Represents a temperature sensor, extending Sensor.
UART
Represents the UART communication protocol.
Wifi
Represents a WiFi device.
WirelessIO
Represents a wireless input/output device, extending Device.
